Text:
Lorelei Endures, Full Video 
Lovely Ms. Lorelei Lee is subjected to unspeakable treatment at the hands of Claire Adams and Damon Pierce. Bound to the bondage table, she's pierced with many acupuncture needles, which are then electrified. Claire finds her cries of anguish irritating, so she decides to smother her by sitting on her face as Damon continues with the ?shock therapy?. Next, she's suspended by her wrists, covered in heat ointment, sealed in plastic wrap, and forced to exercise while getting repeatedly cattle prodded by Claire. Claire then decides to enjoy herself a little as she uses the magic wand to masturbate while Damon whips Lorelei for Claire's pleasure. Finally, Lorelei is rewarded with an orgasm for having taken her punishment so well. 

Cheerz  :-)
